content: I loved this from when it was online. Future reviewers, this game is short because it was a small flash game from when Amanita Design started.
Great game but the story is to short.

One should note that this is a remake of one of their first (flash) games and therefore lacks the challenge of Samorost 3 or Machinarium. But it is nevertheless great to have and replay :D Hope they port the new games (creaks and pilgrim) soon.
OMG...i love this game... amazing graphic
Pretty, but irritating gameplay. Unintuitive controls that ultimately just become annoying and detract from the game play.
Very nice and similar to Machinarium and Somorost 3. But very short.
I like this game. It is really short but it's got the same cute artwork as the 3rd game and nice music. That didn't bother me too much as I brought the game on sale.
Very nice but far too short. Just as I felt it was getting started, it finished. Really disappointed.
Very short, controls are disappointingly lame, some puzzles are just weird and without any helpful hints.
Just played and earned two achievements out of 13.
I would have rated this higher if it wasn't such a truly short short game. Was disappointing. Graphics great. Loved number 3 hoping for a 4
I played Samorest3 before and then bought this release without reading the review and this disappointed me as the story is very very short compare to previous one.
Nice but a bit short indeed. Lucky me, I purchased on sales.

A rush job, unlike other amanita design games. The graphics are patchwork, and there are no real puzzles. Finding out where you should tap is the most challenging it gets. It's cute, but not beautiful, unlike other games from the same developer. Super short, too.

I have given 5 starts to every other Amanita game and I was SO excited to see this released. The issue is that it's really short (like finished in under an hour short). The game itself has all of the artistry and creativity of the other games and is super fun, but for the money paid, I wish it was longer.
Like Samorost 3 the game is not designed to be played on tiny mobile screens, and is far too expensive for what it is.
Too short for how much it costs.
I do like these but only three stars for paying and it's so short.
The awesome funny game. The another masterpiece from Amanita Design.
We have spent many hours with my son playing this, he liked the music a lot.
Чудесная игра, ещё бы Creaks и Pilgrims порты на андроид, но видимо это не суждено
Fun, but way too short for money
So excited to play another installment! Beautiful graphics, intuitive, long and fun storyline. Difficult enough
Absolutely love all your games, in fact i own all of the titles available on Android... Pls make an effort to get the rest of your older titles on here too.
too short for $
played this game when it first came out on pc. loved it then and love it now. a really special game.
Yos, finally on Vedroid. Waiting for first part remake now) (and 2 part machinarium ofc)
Already know I'm gonna love it. Love every game from this dev. Thank you! Thank you! THANK YOU!!!!
Yes! Finally! Love this game!
